response.original_title: Watch with Mother: The Next Generation
response.overview: For those of you who still talk to teddy bears, remember when hamsters drove speedboats or look for 'Pogle people' when you walk in the woods, this classic video collection of vintage Watch with Mother will re-spark your favourite childhood memories and have you singing at the circuits with Barnaby the Bear.  So, if you're still sitting comfortably, now is your chance to take the lift to the top-floor flat where you can play with that odd little trio again - Mary, Mungo and Midge. And if you remember the magic word, you can return to the Herb Garden with Parsley the Lion and see what mischief he's getting into todayâ€¦  Tales of The Riverbank: "A Ride in Guinea's Jeep", Pogles Wood: "Honey Bees", The Herbs: "Strawberry Picking", Mary Mungo and Midge: "The Crane", Barnaby: "The Circus".
response.tagline: Watch with Mother: The Next Generation
response.title: Watch with Mother: The Next Generation
